duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement the organization's core fundraising activities, including grant writing, reporting, and fundraising communication.
Communicate with funders to ensure engagement and increasing level of commitment to the organization.
Track proposal and reporting deadlines, ensure all submitted materials are accurate, and comply with all funder requirements.
Identify new institutional leads and prospects to diversify funding sources.
Process significant subgrants to member organizations and other partners.
Support member organizations’ fundraising capacity by working with the development team.
Manage and track funder communications for the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Nonprofit Management, Business Administration, or related field (Master's Preferred)
